name: Rizūdo
description:
Defend yourself against an onslaught of demons that are attacking you along with the beat!

You can hit them along your zone by hitting keys on beat and trying to hit them perfectly to increase their combos

Try to get your best score and become the best swordsmen you can be.  

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls are for each lane of monsters:

ControlsHit Along the RingPress FLeftPress  SPACEUpPress J
Right
HOLD KEY for DRAGONRELEASE KEY on TAIL

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Duncan Fu - Programmer,  Designer & Artist
